Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1062 Garbage and Rubbish Collection and Disposal

EDITOR’S NOTE: The City of Springboro by Ordinance 89-110, passed December 21, 1989, has approved the schedule of fees levied by the Clinton-Warren Joint Solid Waste Management Policy Committee as stated in Policy Committee Resolution No. 89-8, adopted December 6, 1989.

1062.01Open containers; filthy accumulations.

1062.02Disposal by collection agency required.

1062.03Contracts for collection.

1062.04Containers; collection of excessive quantities of garbage and rubbish.

1062.05Commercial collection license required; fee; compliance with chapter required.

1062.06Rates; billing.

1062.07Delinquency; collection.

1062.08Board of Sanitation Claims.

1062.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Collection and disposal of garbage - see Ohio R.C. 715.43, 717.01

Employment of scavengers - see Ohio R.C. 3707.39

Disposal and transportation upon public ways - see Ohio R.C. 3767.20 et seq.

Filthy accumulations, noxious odors, polluting and diverting watercourses - see GEN. OFF. 660.04

Dumping - see GEN. OFF. 660.14

Undesirable accumulations - see GEN. OFF. 660.17

Unclean habitations - see GEN. OFF. Ch. 668
